definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Boolean" id="isGlow">isGlow</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LTE</field><value name="A"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">DIVIDE</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_health"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="entity_health_max"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.33</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:isGlow</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="variables_set_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:isGlow</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="return_logic"><value name="return"><block type="variables_get_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:isGlow</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
